title: Class II Recall: Philips MRI System Software Update
description: Software issue affecting image quality in certain Philips MRI systems manufactured between 2020-2023
summary: Check your Philips MRI systems for software version 5.7.1 and contact Philips for immediate update to prevent image quality issues.

title: CPT 70553 Rate Change: +2.8%
description: MRI Brain with contrast rate increased from $289.45 to $297.56 effective January 2025

title: Drug Shortage: Gadolinium-based Contrast Agents
description: Manufacturing delays affecting multiple gadolinium contrast agents used in MRI imaging

title: CMS 2026 Physician Fee Schedule Comment Period
description: Due: 2025-03-15 (58 days). Action: Submit comments on proposed imaging payment changes
actionRequired: Submit comments on proposed imaging payment changes

title: Security Update for MAGNETOM Systems
description: Critical security patch for network vulnerability in MAGNETOM MRI systems
